divs: Sighting DetailsSaw red object on North Western horizon, watched for 15 minutes while objectascended from 15 degrees up to 65 degrees, object changed colour as it ascendedfrom red through orange to black.The object disappeared I was watching through binoculars.The object was many kilometeres distant, but appeared to be quite large.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waitakere City
This sighting has never been favorited.
